Message:
Before I could do anything,
the creature roared,
and the entire area was
covered in fog.

I have a bad feeling about this...
The same as I felt back then.

When the Knights’ bloodlust
consumed my entire village.

By the time I felt
something was amiss,
I was already too late...
and because of me, Ma was...

No, it can’t be possible.
After all, she...

My mother emerged
from within the fog.

Her smile was warm and gentle,
just as how I remembered it...

But in the next instant,
her body was engulfed in flames.

As those words leave
my mother’s mouth,
she reaches her hand out to me...

No... This is an illusion,
not my mother.

“...I see. Once again,
all you’re doing is watching
while I burn, aren’t you?”

That day, all I did was watch
as the flames swallowed
my mother alive...
